summary: Wing Chun's village is yet again being plundered by bandits. This time she uses kung fu to defeat them. The fighting doesn't end here.
cast: Michelle Yeoh|Donnie Yen|King-Tan Yuen|Catherine Yan Hung|Waise Lee|Norman Chu|Chui Ah-Fai|Pei-Pei Cheng|Zhi-Hui Chen|Liu Hen|Yue-Qiu Hou|Guo Jia-Qing|Xian-Quan Kong|Fu-Wai Lam|Xiaozhou Li|Jin Mao-Heng|Chaai Ming|Yu Tao|Feng-Chao Wang|Xue Wen-Cheng|Xiangdong Xu|Yang Yang|Shu Yao-Xuan|Bo Yu|Lian-Zhong Zhang|Yang Zhang|Yu-Ting Zhang|Yi Zhao|Su-Ping Zhou
keywords: martial arts|wing chun|battle|cult film|man fighting woman
title: Wing Chun
